text: "Why Do Fools Fall in Love" is a 1956 song by Frankie Lymon and The Teenagers. It went to number 1 in the United Kingdom and number 1 on the R&B; charts. It went on to be covered by The Beach Boys in 1964 and Diana Ross in 1981 as the title track for her 12th studio album Why Do Fools Fall in Love. It topped the single charts in the Netherlands and Belgium. ==References== Category:1956 songs Category:Doo-wop songs Category:The Beach Boys songs Category:Diana Ross songs Category:Joni Mitchell songs Category:The Four Seasons (band) songs
title: Why Do Fools Fall in Love (song)
